name: Mogilnik
description:
This is the first game I'm making.

It's a turn-based rogelike that takes place in the one dark room.

Implemented:

  • 5 enemies with unique mechanics
  • Leveling system
  • Potentially endless gameplay

I plan to implement in the future: 

  • 15 unique enemies
  • 10 unique items to be dropped from them
  • Сoins and store in the main menu
  • Inventory system
  • Improved AI of monsters
  • Global Target

Any feedback would be appreciated :)

Music - me (Umirid)

Sounds - open source/me (Umirid)

Sprites - open source/me (Umirid)

WASD - to control 

TAB - inventory
